Liushutong characters (1)

敺字的基本解释

敺
qū
同“驱”。

敺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》豈俱切，平虞，溪。］
亦作“2”。
(1)“驅”的古字。驱赶；驱逐。
(2)“驅”的古字。驾驭。
(3)“驅”的古字。行进；进至。
(4)“驅”的古字。逼迫。
(5)见“敺世”。
(6)通“嫗”。养育。参见“敺養”。
[②]［ōu］
［《集韻》於口切，上厚，影。］
通“毆1”。
捶击，殴打。

敺字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敺； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页475第06
【玉篇】古文驅字。【周禮·夏官·方相氏】以索室敺疫。【前漢·鼂錯傳】敺略畜產。【註】師古曰：敺與驅同。【佩觽集】以毆擊之毆爲敺，逐其順，非有如此者。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" Qi Juqi, Pingyu, Xi. ]
Also called "2".
(1) The ancient word for "drive". Drive away; drive away.
(2) The ancient word for "drive". control.
(3) The ancient word for "drive". March forward;
(4) The ancient word for "drive". force.
(5) See "Exorcising the World".
(6) Through "women". Nurture. See "drive".
[②] [ōu]
["Ji Yun" cut in the mouth, thick and shadow. ]
Same as "Beat 1".
Beat, beat.
drive
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　 drove; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 475 06
[Jade articles] Ancient prose to drive words. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Fang Xiangshi】Expelled the epidemic in the Esuo room. 【Previous Han·鼂輂异传】to drive out livestock. [Note] Shi Gu said: Drive and drive together. [Pei Zong Collection] Use assault to expel Qishun, which is not the case.
